title: 6 ingredient Allergy-free Dates-free Raw Energy Bar
directions: Chuck them all into food processor until they come together like a dough
Transfer to a baking dish lined with parchment paper and press the dough firm in there
Refrigerate overnight and cut them up as bars.
ingredients: Carob powder-1 Tbsp (gives a great depth to it)-OPTIONAL
Pepita seeds-1/2 cup [not in stock? Add more Sunflower seeds]
